MB Construction Company

Full Stack Developer

Full-Stack developer for company web applications using WordPress, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, & other technologies to build responsive and dynamic content to audiences. Implemented digital marketing and SEO strategies for company web app using Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Google Adwords, Bing Ads, and other search related marketing tools. Built and developed databases & UI forms for managing and monitoring scheduling needs, production, supplies, and billing. Developed and maintained company website and technologies.

Granger Construction Company

Site Manager

Responsible for maintaining the job schedule and keeping job cost within budget numbers. Updated project management tools on progress and actual job costs. Scheduling of deliveries, sub-contract labor, building inspections, and other logistics related job functions. Generate daily reports on work production, site visits from 3rd party personnel, weather events, and other critical day to day information related to project management.
